channel.title: If you don't know what hardcore/grindcore sounds like....Please don't vote
channel.description:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ciw_1Sd9Zik - for those too lazy to download, watch here, had to add in random pic to make a vid...
http://www.megaupload.com/?d=L8YDZRZ1 - link to download song...
I know no one likes to download, but it wouldn't upload right on here, also it wastes Mopar's precious bandwith.
This is a song I found....It had no lyrics....Sooo....I decided to sing....tell me if this sucks or not...if you have heard hardcore/grindcore, you know what this is supposed to sound like. This is me singing....
By the way I'm 15...

Hella lot better than gay rap, pop, and country shi*.[/quote]

Whoah whoah whoah, now lets not be dissing the country music now I like country, but it has to be good country. Roadhammers are a good country band, I liked them when they performed live at my shitty little town so I downloaded their music and it’s pretty good.
